name: Birthday Cake
meaning: The birthday cake emoji represents birthdays, celebrations, milestones, and moments centered around personal achievements and special days.
when_to_use: Use this emoji for birthdays, anniversaries, celebrations of age, or marking personal milestones.
when_not_to_use: Avoid using it in non-celebratory or serious conversations.
